allow_ads.description: [bool]If set the wielding player can enter aim-down-sights mode for this weapon.

wielder_enter_animation_event.description: [string]Animation event to send when a wielder is set.

wielder_exit_animation_event.description: [string]Animation event to send when the wielder is removed.

wield_state_audio_event.description: [wwise]Wwise event to set the currently-equipped weapon state
